participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, Ethan loves exploring new ideas and has a strong connection to nature. He is also quite empathetic and values family deeply.
participant_1.background: I got my finger crushed in a machine when I was working at the factory. I was raised by my single mother, and she did a great job. My family is important to me, but my job is demanding and I don't always get to see them as much as I would like. I'm single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with. I spend my free time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas.

participant_2.name: Sofia
participant_2.personality: Sofia is enthusiastic and passionate about her interests. She is a supportive friend and values her relationships, always looking for ways to celebrate life's victories.
participant_2.background: I'm spending time with my mom and celebrating her cancer victory. I moved to NY to study in a prestigious designing school. I drive a blue Honda Civic. I am married to a man. Kesha is my favorite singer of all time.

content.text: Hello! I'm so excited to be matched with you today. What do you like to do in your free time?
I enjoy listening to Kesha while I'm driving around in my blue Honda Civic.
I love Kesha! She is my favorite singer of all time.
That's awesome! She's a lot of fun. Do you have any other hobbies?
I spend a lot of time tinkering with new cellphone app ideas. I'm also single, but I'd love to find someone to share my love of nature with.
That sounds fun! I'm married to a man and we spend a lot of time together. We recently moved to New York so I could study at a prestigious designing school.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that you're happy.
Thanks! I'm really excited to be here.
Me too! I'm sure we'll get along great
